name: Solomon
description: Wisest king, David's son. Built the Temple, wrote Proverbs and Ecclesiastes. 'Ask for wisdom.' Wealth, women, and eventual folly.

throne-wisdom.name: On the Throne of Wisdom
throne-wisdom.description: Seated on magnificent throne, rendering judgment
throne-wisdom.prompt: seated on magnificent throne with lions - serene wise expression, crown on head, hand raised in judgment, the wisest king rendering decisions

baby-judgment.name: The Wisdom Test
baby-judgment.description: The famous judgment - revealing the true mother
baby-judgment.prompt: seated in judgment as two women plead before him - sword being held or pointed toward infant, about to reveal true mother through wisdom, legendary judgment

dedicating-temple.name: Temple Dedication
dedicating-temple.prompt: arms raised in prayer before magnificent Temple - dedicating the house of God, life's greatest achievement, glory filling the Temple

asking-wisdom.name: Asking for Wisdom
asking-wisdom.description: Young Solomon asking God for wisdom at Gibeon
asking-wisdom.prompt: young king kneeling in prayer at Gibeon - asking for wisdom instead of wealth or long life, the request that pleased God, humble beginning

writing-proverbs.name: Writing Wisdom
writing-proverbs.prompt: seated writing on scroll - quill in hand, thoughtful expression, composing the wisdom that would teach generations, 3000 proverbs and 1005 songs

vanity-reflection.name: All is Vanity
vanity-reflection.description: Older Solomon, reflecting on life's emptiness
vanity-reflection.prompt: older king in contemplation - weary but wise, having experienced everything yet finding emptiness, 'vanity of vanities', hard-won wisdom
